page.title: 05HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Ladies Bright Hour} meets at the Baptist Hall. It is a religious group aimed at fellowship throughout the village. {The Library} exists to promote the enjoyment of books. The library computer contains details of all library books in the Oxfordshire Library Service. {The Local History Group} meets at Netting Cottage.It aims to keep a record of life in Hook Norton, past and present. Publications include a Village Trail and a Footpaths Guide. {The Luncheon Club} meets at the Memorial Hall to share a meal and conversation. {The Patchwork Group} meets at Milverton, Park Road. The group aims to make patchwork quilts which are then sold to raise money for charity.
